ygData.subject: Conch Shell horn
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, this (also?) drops in Cobalt Scar off Sirens. Darkfox I could have sworn I got one in Cobalt Scar - but I may be confused - possible a Player gave it to
ygData.messageBody:
Yep, this (also?) drops in Cobalt Scar off Sirens.

Darkfox
I could have sworn I got one in Cobalt Scar - but I may be confused -
possible a Player gave it to me in Cobalt Scar (still haven't gone deeper
than CS)

Slyde




Siren's Grotto if you're curious heh.

Shada

> * NEW * Conch Shell Horn (Found in Velious... somewhere...) Brass
> instrument, appears to give about a 5% bonus to brass songs.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
